title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the derivatives

1 point is earned if uses B'(t) = v(t)

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for units in (a) or (b)

2L(t)L'(t) = 2B(t)B'(t)

L ′ (40)= B(40)v(40) L(40) = 9⋅2.5 144+81 = 3 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGabmitayaafa GaaiikaiaaisdacaaIWaGaaiykaiabg2da9maalaaabaGaamOqaiaa cIcacaaI0aGaaGimaiaacMcacaWG2bGaaiikaiaaisdacaaIWaGaai ykaaqaaiaadYeacaGGOaGaaGinaiaaicdacaGGPaaaaiabg2da9maa laaabaGaaGyoaiabgwSixlaaikdacaGGUaGaaGynaaqaamaakaaaba GaaGymaiaaisdacaaI0aGaey4kaSIaaGioaiaaigdaaSqabaaaaOGa eyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacaaIZaaabaGaaGOmaaaaaaa@535A@ meters/sec
